info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH TORRENTIAL RAINFALL WILL IMPACT EASTERN CABARRUS AND UNION COUNTIES UNTIL 1230 AM EDT... At 1143 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms with torrential rainfall along a line extending from 10 miles west of Albemarle to 8 miles southwest of Monroe, and moving east at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Monroe, Unionville, Wesley Chapel, Wingate, Marshville, Mineral Springs, Mt Pleasant, Midland, Fairview In Union County and Sturdivants. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour and wind gusts to 30 mph will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
